thread.title: Yahoo chief Marissa Mayer says expecting twins in December
thread.title_full: Yahoo chief Marissa Mayer says expecting twins in December

author: Robert Fenner
title: Yahoo chief Marissa Mayer says expecting twins in December
text:
The 40-year-old plans to take limited time away from her role and work throughout the pregnancy. Photo: AP
Marissa Mayer, chief executive officer of Yahoo!, said she is pregnant with identical twin girls that are due in December.
The 40-year-old plans to take limited time away from her role and work throughout the pregnancy as she did with the birth of her son, according to a post on her blog .
The news had been shared with the board and Yahoo's executive team, she said.
Advertisement "Moving forward, there will be a lot to do for both my family and for Yahoo," Mayer wrote. "Both will require hard work and thoughtful prioritisation."
Mayer's pregnancy comes as the California-based portal prepares to spin off its stake in Alibaba Group Holding to investors.
Yahoo expects the deal to be completed in the fourth quarter.
Bloomberg
